title: Kims and Chris Around the World
name: Kims and Chris Around the World
description:
A Map by Cjlwright

A map showing the places we have visited and lived.

properties.description: Posted by Cjlwright57 Via Giambellino, milanoActually not sure it wasn\'t number 59, but computer says no! Anyway this is where were put by ISM upon arrival in Milan in Aug/Sep 2005. It was a bit of a disaster, lovely landlady but nightmare neighbours above: there is only so many times you can listen to someone being sick at 2am! Anyway we left for San Gottardo in June 2006 (after many months of looking!).
Posted by CjlwrightCorso San Gottardo 9, milanoWhere we lived from June 2006 to July 2007. Great place, fantastic location! Shame about the street cleaning at 2am!
Posted by CjlwrightHome Sweet Home!

properties.name: Bergamo
properties.description: Posted by CjlwrightStayed in a beautiful hotel in the mountains close to Bergamo and visited here on a day trip for Kims Birthday 2006.

properties.name: Hotel Miramonti
properties.description: Posted by Cjlwright Rota imagna

properties.name: Mount Vesuvius
properties.description: Posted by CjlwrightBeware the scary man half way up the mountain where the bus stops randomly: he will moan about how he wasn\'t allowed to finish his funicular railway and then try and sting you for cash! Mama Mia!

properties.name: Piazza San Marco
properties.description: Posted by CjlwrightWent there in carnival week 2006 with Julia.

properties.name: juliets house
properties.description: Posted by CjlwrightveronaWe visited here with Kelly when she came over in October 2006. Nice amphitheatre and stupid size ice cream! Shame about Juliet\'s house where people seemed to have ignored the \'don\'t write here\' signs!
